question: The "Gribskov Forests" is located in which country?
explanation: Gribskov Forests is one of the Denmark's largest and most beautiful natural areas. It is located in the Zealand Island of Denmark bordered by the Lake Esrum to the north. It is a part of the Royal North Zealand National park. And it was one of three forests included in the UNESCO World Heritage Site, the "Par force hunting landscape in North Zealand".
